EmailTemplate.name: RE: Mark, what could you do with more hours in your workday? (1384466460.0)
EmailTemplate.subject: RE: Mark, what could you do with more hours in your workday? (1384466460.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
- - Standard Template - - 90 Clean Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE Dear Mark , Thank you for reaching out to me. I wanted to introduce myself as the person at MBO Partners responsible for all new associate and partnership requests. I’ll be your main point of contact to provide you an overview of our services and answer any specific questions you may have. You can sign up for MBO now evening if you are not working immediately but let’s chat about this. You may easily book a time that is convenient for you on my online schedule by going here <https://my.timedriver.com/8SLYS>. You can watch a short video about who we are on You Tube <http://youtu.be/zKDzwSTmGv4>. You can learn more about how MBO works by clicking here <http://www.mbopartners.com/how-mbo-works>. I look forward to speaking with you and sharing more information about MBO Partners! Sara ___________________________________SARA CONDEConsultant Services Advisor MBO Partners t: 703.793.6028f: 703.793.6068e: sconde@mbopartners.com <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com>w: www.mbopartners.com <http://www.mbopartners.com/> We’ve got some serious perks you’re eligible to win when you refer a friend <http://referral.mbopartners.com/referral-program?r=conde> to MBO Partners! Ask me about them. Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com <mailto:postmaster@mbopartners.com> and permanently delete the e-mail and files. From: Mark Faust [mailto:mhfaust@bellsouth.net] Sent: Thursday, November 14, 2013 12:39 PM To: info Subject: Re: Mark, what could you do with more hours in your workday? Sara, I am a retired IT and engineering professional who worked for 33 years for a Fortune 500 company. I am now being approached by several small companies to provide training and consulting expertise. These opportunities are speculative at this point and I am discussing specifics with two companies. It appears MBO can help me and I was recommended to you by one of your independent consultants. My question is, if I begin the process of signing up with MBO now, is there any problem if I am not working immediately. As a retiree, work will be part time and sporadic. Is there any problem if I am not billing for, perhaps, months between work. Thanks in advance for any information. If you have any questions about my specific situation, let me know. Mark Faust On Aug 20, 2013, at 2:00 PM, Sara Conde <info@mbopartners.com <mailto:info@mbopartners.com>> wrote: Mark, MBO Partners helps independent contractors save their billable time by providing invoicing, payroll and expense processing services. That means less wasted time, less headaches and more doing what you love. Check out this story <http://link.mbopartners.com/trk?t=2&mid=Njg4LU5QTS01MjU6MjQwMjozMzIxOjExNjcxOjA6MjY2Mzo3OjEyMzc5MzA6bWhmYXVzdEBiZWxsc291dGgubmV0&&&http://info.mbopartners.com/rs/mbo/images/CSA-Story-August_2013.pdf?mkt_tok=3RkMMJWWfF9wsRoluK7IZKXonjHpfsX56e8qUKS2lMI%2F0ER3fOvrPUfGjI4DSsRhI%2BSLDwEYGJlv6SgFTLjNMa5w17gIWRQ%3D> about a consultant who found more time for friends, family and travel by outsourcing his administrative tasks to MBO Partners. Have any questions about how MBO helps independent consultants? Just email me to learn how MBO may be able to help your solo business and maximize your billable hours. ___________________________________ Sara Conde Consultant Services Advisor MBO Partners
e: sconde@mbopartners.com <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com> w: www.mbopartners.com <http://link.mbopartners.com/trk?t=2&mid=Njg4LU5QTS01MjU6MjQwMjozMzIxOjExNjcxOjA6MjY2Mzo3OjEyMzc5MzA6bWhmYXVzdEBiZWxsc291dGgubmV0&&&http://www.mbopartners.com/?mkt_tok=3RkMMJWWfF9wsRoluK7IZKXonjHpfsX56e8qUKS2lMI%2F0ER3fOvrPUfGjI4DSsRhI%2BSLDwEYGJlv6SgFTLjNMa5w17gIWRQ%3D>If you wish to update your email preferences, click on the following link: Subscription Management <http://info.mbopartners.com/SubscriptionManagement.html?mkt_unsubscribe=1&mkt_tok=3RkMMJWWfF9wsRoluK7IZKXonjHpfsX56e8qUKS2lMI%2F0ER3fOvrPUfGjI4DSsRhI%2BSLDwEYGJlv6SgFTLjNMa5w17gIWRQ%3D>
